QuestData.Title: Tremblade Must Die
QuestData.Description:
This battle in Ashran has waged on long enough. It appears they're being led by Grand Marshal Tremblade. If she falls, the Alliance will crumble.
Push forward through the center road, make your way into their keep and take down Tremblade.
For the Horde!
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Tremblade leads the Alliance forces in Ashran.
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay Grand Marshal Tremblade found in the Alliance base Stormshield Keep within Ashran.
